latestPosts.caption:
🥗 Startup Grand Challenge in Food Sector 3.0 is here!
An exciting opportunity to revolutionize the future of food in India! 🚀🇮🇳

Calling innovative startups working on:
1️⃣ Sustainable / Smart Packaging Solutions
2️⃣ AI-based Automation & Sensors for MSMEs
3️⃣ Alternate Proteins with Advanced Amino Acid Profiles
4️⃣ Food Safety & Traceability Systems

🗓️ Last date to apply: 16th August 2025
💡 If you’re building the future of food, this is your stage.

👉 Apply now and be a part of India’s food-tech transformation!
https://www.startupindia.gov.in/content/sih/en/ams-application/challenge.html?applicationId=687656cbe4b074eae6d24fbe

#StartupIndia #BharatStartupChallenge #FoodTech #Innovation #MSME #SmartPackaging #DeepTech #Sustainability #WorldFoodIndia2025 #MoFPI #ViksitBharat

latestPosts.caption:
🌍 Kumbhathon Startup Festival 2025 is here!
A once-in-a-decade opportunity to co-create AI-powered innovations for Kumbh Mela 2027 — the world’s largest gathering!

🚀 In collaboration with the Decentralized AI program at MIT Media Lab, led by Dr. Ramesh Raskar, this festival invites startups, designers, mentors, investors, and industry leaders to build bold, transformative solutions.

🧠 All innovations are welcome — whether aligned with our curated challenges or entirely original ideas.

🔍 Thematic Areas:
🤖 AI for Social Good | 🏥 Health Tech | 🛕 Spiritual Tech
🍛 Food Tech | 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 People Tech | 🎭 Art & Culture Tech
🏗️ Infra Tech | 🌱 Sustainability Tech

📲 Apply by 26th July 2025 and be part of shaping the first AI-Powered Kumbh!

#Kumbhathon #StartupIndia #BharatStartupChallenge #AIForGood #InnovationForKumbh #MITMediaLab #KumbhMela2027 #FutureOfTech #SocialImpact #DeepTechIndia #ViksitBharathttps://www.startupindia.gov.in/content/sih/en/ams-application/challenge.html?applicationId=68760d67e4b074eae6d1de42

#StartupIndia #BharatStartupChallenge #FoodTech #Innovation #MSME #SmartPackaging #DeepTech #Sustainability #WorldFoodIndia2025 #MoFPI #ViksitBharat

latestPosts.caption:
Startup India, DPIIT, has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Roche Products (India) Private Limited to strengthen and accelerate the growth of healthcare and life sciences startups in India.

As part of this strategic collaboration, Roche will provide key support to startups through:
🔹 Mentorship on regulatory pathways, intellectual property, and global health standards
🔹 Facilitation of pilot projects and validation studies in real-world settings
🔹 Access to cutting-edge technology platforms, infrastructure, and international programs
🔹 Capacity-building in Health Economics and Outcomes Research (HEOR), Good Clinical Practices (GCP), and patient engagement
This collaboration is set to boost innovation and create new growth avenues within India’s dynamic startup landscape.

#StartupIndia #DPIIT #HealthcareInnovation #LifeSciences

latestPosts.caption:
Ready to build tech that touches millions? 
The Ujjain Mahakumbh Hackathon is calling innovators from across the country to reimagine how Simhastha 2028 — one of the world’s largest spiritual gatherings can become smarter, safer, and more immersive. 
From smart mobility and surveillance to sanitation and cultural tech experiences, this is your chance to solve real-world challenges that matter.
Rewards That Match Your Vision:
1st Prize: ₹8,00,000
2nd Prize: ₹5,00,000
3rd Prize: ₹3,00,000
Don’t just compete — build, innovate, and become a part of cultural-tech history.
Last date to apply - 21st July 2025
Apply Now -https://mpsedc.mp.gov.in/SimhasthaTechHackathon.aspx
#StartupIndia #DPIIT #Ujjain #UjjainMahakumbhHackathon #Simhastha #Innovation

latestPosts.caption:
Across India, startups are solving challenges that truly matter, be it in health, sustainability, agriculture, or frontier technologies. The National Startup Awards 5.0 is here to honour those who are building not just businesses, but real-world change.
This is your opportunity to gain national recognition, connect with key policymakers, and open doors to growth. With just 3 days left, the clock is ticking.
If you believe your innovation deserves the spotlight, now’s the time to step forward.
Let your impact be seen, valued, and celebrated.

Apply before it’s too late.: https://rb.gy/3bg0yf 

#StartupIndia #DPIIT #NationalStartupAwards2025

Startup India, DPIIT has signed an MoU with Power Grid Corporation of India Limited (POWERGRID) to support DPIIT-recognized startups in the power and allied sectors.
Under this partnership, POWERGRID will:
🔹 Co-develop solutions with startups in automation, asset management, cybersecurity, and domestic supply chains in HVDC, GIB, and cables.
🔹 Provide pilot opportunities to test and scale innovations.
🔹 Offer mentorship, technical guidance, and access to domain experts and infrastructure.

#StartupIndia #DPIIT #Innovation

latestPosts.caption:
We’re proud to announce the launch of the fourth edition of BEAUTY&YOU India. Created by ELC’s New Incubation Ventures, the program propels and supports the next generation of entrepreneurs reimagining the future of beauty in India. 
 
We’re proud to return with lead partner @mynykaa and a new partnership with @StartupIndia.Gov.In. 
 
Winners will be recognized across four categories and receive $50-150K (41 lakhs -1.25 crores) to support their ideas, mentorship, retail support, and national visibility. 
 
Award categories: 
 
◾️ GROW – Best in-market beauty brands 
◾️ IMAGINE – Best pre-launch concepts 
◾️ BREAKTHROUGH – Best new innovations 
◾️ NEW: VISIONARY WOMEN’S AWARD – Jury prize recognizing the impact of outstanding women entrepreneurs 
 
Building the future of Indian beauty? This is your moment. 
Apply by August 24 at www.beautyandyouawards.com

🚀 Propelling India’s DeepTech Ecosystem Forward!

In a proactive step to strengthen India’s innovation landscape, Hon’ble Minister of Commerce & Industry, Shri @piyushgoyalofficial along with Hon’ble Minister of State for Commerce & Industry and Electronics & IT, Shri @jitinprasada chaired a high-impact interaction with over 40 leading DeepTech startups in India.

Held on 15th July 2025 at Vanijya Bhawan, New Delhi, the meeting focused on key challenges and opportunities in the sector, with in-depth discussions around:
💵 Funding accessibility
📚 Regulatory hurdles
📈 Market access

The insights gathered from this dialogue will play a pivotal role in nurturing and accelerating the growth of India’s DeepTech ecosystem. This initiative reaffirms the government’s strong commitment to building a supportive environment for technological innovation and economic progress.

#DeepTechIndia #StartupIndia #Innovation #PiyushGoyal #JitinPrasada #TechForBharat #ViksitBharat #FutureOfTech
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Startup India on July 15, 2025. May be an image of 9 people and text.

latestPosts.caption:
At the 10th National Startup Advisory Council (NSAC) meeting held today in New Delhi, Secretary, Ministry of Commerce & Industry, Shri Amardeep Singh Bhatia, shared critical insights on the evolving funding landscape for Indian startups.

He emphasized how strategic capital infusion through flagship initiatives like the Startup India Seed Fund Scheme and the newly proposed Fund of Funds is unlocking early-stage innovation and nurturing the next generation of breakthrough technologies.

With focused funding and a vision for long-term growth, the message was clear: India’s startup story is just getting started — and capital will not be a constraint for innovation.

#StartupIndia #NSAC #SeedFundScheme #DeepTechIndia #StartupFunding #InnovationCapital #AmardeepBhatia #FundOfFunds #IndiaInnovates #ViksitBharat #DeepTechRevolution #EntrepreneurshipIndia

latestPosts.caption:
🌟 Strengthening the Backbone of India’s Startup Story!

At the 10th National Startup Advisory Council (NSAC) meeting held today in New Delhi, Hon’ble Minister of State for Commerce & Industry and Electronics & IT, Shri @jitinprasada addressed the council with a compelling vision for India’s innovation-led growth.

He lauded the transformative impact India’s startup ecosystem has made across sectors, from digital public infrastructure to grassroots entrepreneurship, and emphasised the need to now shift gears towards greater scale, deeper innovation, and inclusive access.

🔹 Stressing on the importance of future-facing sectors like AI, deep-tech and cyber-resilience
🔹 Encouraging more collaborative platforms between government, industry, and academia
🔹 Calling for a stronger India-first innovation mindset that solves global problems

The Hon'ble Minister’s address was a powerful call to action, to not just sustain the momentum, but to build an ecosystem that is bold, inclusive, and future-proof.

India’s startup revolution is not just about ideas, it’s about impact at scale.

#StartupIndia #NSAC #InnovationIndia #TechForGood #DigitalEconomy #ViksitBharat #IndiaStartupEcosystem #PublicPrivatePartnership #NextGenStartups #InclusiveInnovation #TechPolicy

latestPosts.caption:
🚀 Powering India’s Innovation Engine – One Bold Step at a Time!

The 10th meeting of the National Startup Advisory Council (NSAC) was held today in New Delhi, chaired by Hon’ble Minister of Commerce & Industry, Shri @piyushgoyalofficial and Hon'ble Minister of State for Commerce & Industry and Electronics & Information and Technology Shri @jitinprasada

Bringing together top policy-makers, industry leaders, startup founders, and ecosystem enablers, the meeting focused on shaping the next phase of India’s startup journey; one that is deeper, bolder, and more inclusive.

Key themes spotlighted at the meeting included:
🔬 Unleashing the potential of deep-tech to solve complex global and national challenges
🤝 Strengthening public-private partnerships to drive scale, innovation, and inclusion
📚 A sharper focus on policy research and forward-looking recommendations
🌐 The phenomenal success of Startup Mahakumbh and the roadmap for its 2026 edition
🌱 Strategies to deepen the existing startup ecosystem, making it more resilient and future-ready

India is rapidly emerging as the startup capital of the world, and with every such convening, we move closer to our collective dream of a Viksit Bharat - powered by innovation, entrepreneurship, and collaboration.

#StartupIndia #NSAC #DeepTech #PublicPrivatePartnerships #PolicyForStartups #InnovateIndia #ViksitBharat #AtmanirbharBharat #DigitalIndia
